main event: A civilian employee reported a UFO sighting in Las Alumos, N. Mex. in 1949.
interesting points: The UFO was described as a brilliant green, football-shaped object.
It was observed at 0310 MST for 2-3 seconds, traveling at a slow speed before suddenly changing course to 270 degrees.
The sighting was reported by a credible civilian employee.
The UFO was seen at a low angle and appeared to be the size of a football.
There were no photographs or sketches of the UFO provided in the report.
